text: Borsch, or borscht, is a beetroot soup of East European origin. Borsch, borscht, borsh or borshch may also refer to: * Bœrsch, a commune in France * Borsh, a village in Albania * BORSCHT or BORSHT, a telecommunications technology * Borscht Corporation, a non-profit filmmaking organization * Viktor Borshch (born 1948), Russian volleyball player ==See also == * Borsch (surname), for people with the German surname Borsch or Börsch * Borș (disambiguation) * Bosch (disambiguation) * Ostern, or Borscht Western, a film genre *
title: Borsch (disambiguation)
